main event: An elongated, illuminated green object was observed descending at a low altitude in Crescent City, California.
interesting points: The object increased in brilliance as it approached the ground,It was described as having a thick shape like a short cigar but elongated like a bean seed,The sighting duration was about four seconds,Two witnesses considered reliable reported the sighting,The incident occurred during a time of meteor showers, suggesting a possible natural explanation.
witness description: Mr. ----, General Manager of Standard Lumber Company and a watchman at the plant, both considered reliable.
